<JD_START>
Job Title: Field Service Support, Hourly

Location: Plymouth, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Innovate to solve the world's most important challenges

Design solutions to drive safe living and quality of life

Join the industry leader to design the next generation of breakthroughs. We are looking for someone who has experience in light commercial and/or heavy commercial markets to join our team. HVAC Fitters must be skilled in their trade, and we prefer a minimum of 3 years of actual, practical working experience in the HVAC pipefitting and/or mechanical equipment industry. You will represent Honeywell by learning to serve the customer directly and will be responsible for servicing equipment and ensuring customer satisfaction by identifying, examining, diagnosing, and repairing equipment and systems at customer’s location. The main function of this position is to respond and providing technical support through on-site installation and troubleshooting to Honeywell customers and their HVAC mechanical equipment. Additional responsibilities related to the technical delivery include preventive maintenance, time and material work, equipment upgrades and small service jobs. These customers will have various products installed that fall into HVAC and automation controls and you will be the customer’s subject matter expert.

 Location: Greater Minneapolis Area, MN

KEY RESPONSIBLITIES

 On Site Installation, Replacement, Maintenance and repair of Chillers, Rooftop Units, Air Handling Units, Exhaust Fans, Split Systems, Boilers, Pumps, Coils, Water Heaters, Unit Heaters, etc. Can independently troubleshoot and repair mechanical systems. Provide preventative maintenance on comprehensive and preventative tasking contracts. Run one-off problems, scenarios, and integrations based on the needs of the customer. Complete required documentation for work performed or other contractual obligations. Follows all safety standards and use of PPE and attends required safety training.YOU MUST HAVE Ability to obtain Master Certificate of Competency for Minneapolis/St. Paul for Gas Fitter, Steam & Hotwater Systems installer, Refrigeration Systems installerAbility to work independently.High School Diploma or GED.Ability to travel throughout the service area, with occasional overnight stays.Valid Driver’s License and driving record acceptable to Honeywell.Appropriate experience to work with refrigerants.Good verbal and written communication skills.

WE VALUE

 5 + years of mechanical HVAC experience. Previous technical/installation experience. Previous customer service experience.

Additional Information

JOB ID: req443430Category: Customer ExperienceLocation: 1405 Xenium Lane N, Suite 230B,Plymouth,Minnesota,55441,United StatesNonexempt

Customer Experience (GLOBAL)

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
